peripheralPage.name: _instance

intOption.name: NumChannels
intOption.toolTip: The number of DMA channels available

intOption.name: NumVectors
intOption.toolTip: Number of DMA interrupt vectors - \n Multiple channels may be mapped to the same vector

peripheralPage.template:
/** 	 * Enable clock to $(_class) 	 */ 	static void enableClock() { #ifdef PCC 	 // DMA is always clocked #else 	 $(clockEnable) #endif 	}


	/** 	 * Disable clock to $(_class) 	 */ 	static void disableClock() { #ifdef PCC 	 // DMA is always clocked #else 	 $(clockDisable) #endif 	}

//! IRQ numbers for hardware 	static constexpr IRQn_Type irqNums[] = $(_name)_IRQS;


	//! Number of IRQs for hardware 	static constexpr uint32_t irqCount = sizeof(irqNums)/sizeof(irqNums[0]);

irqOption.name: irqHandlers
irqOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handlers for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

irqOption.name: errorIrqHandler
irqOption.toolTip: This selection allow the interrupt handlers for this peripheral to be installed using several different methods

peripheralPage.template:
//! Class based callback handler has been installed in vector table
 	static constexpr bool irqHandlerInstalled = $(irqHandlers);

intOption.name: irqLevel
intOption.toolTip: Sets the priority level used to configure the NVIC\n Lower numbers represent higher priorities

peripheralPage.template:
//! Default IRQ level
 	static constexpr uint32_t irqLevel = $(irqLevel);

//! Number of DMA channels implemented 	static constexpr unsigned NumChannels = $(NumChannels);


	//! Number of DMA vectors implemented 	static constexpr unsigned NumVectors = $(NumVectors);
